Package cps.mouradalpha.connectors

Class ConnectorManagementCI

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • cps.mouradalpha.connectors.ConnectorManagementCI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManagementCI, ManagementImplementationI, SubscriptionImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ConnectorI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI, java.rmi.Remote
    public class ConnectorManagementCI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
implements ManagementCI
    The class ConnectorManagementCI implements a connector that links components which offer/require services that are present in ManagementCI

    Description

    a call of any method from the Publisher/Subscriber component will be transfered and execute by the Broker
    Author:
    Mourad TOUATI / Alpha Issiaga DIALLOs
